text: "You Bowed Down" is a 1991 song written by Elvis Costello and was released as a single by Roger McGuinn on his sixth studio album Back from Rio. ==Elvis Costello & The Attractions version== In 1996, Costello re-recorded "You Bowed Down" for his 17th studio album All This Useless Beauty. It went to number 8 on the Billboard Adult Alternative Airplay Songs charts. ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:Jangle pop songs Category:Elvis Costello songs
title: You Bowed Down
